pkgmetadata.longdescription: Breast Cancer Risk Assessment // Functions provide risk projections of invasive breast cancer based on Gail model according to National Cancer Institute's Breast Cancer Risk Assessment Tool algorithm for specified race/ethnic groups and age intervals. Gail MH, Brinton LA, et al (1989) doi:10.1093/jnci/81.24.1879. Marthew PB, Gail MH, et al (2016) doi:10.1093/jnci/djw215.
